home.title: Les √âtoiles du Rocher
home.subtitle: Your haven of peace on the French Riviera

content.quote: ¬´ There are places where the spirit breathes. ¬ª
content.description1: Picture a place where luxury meets authenticity, where every detail has been crafted for your comfort. Our estate, nestled just 5 minutes from Monaco, offers you the perfect balance between absolute tranquility and privileged access to the most beautiful beaches, luxury boutiques, and events on the French Riviera.
content.description2: Immerse yourself in a 350 m¬≤ universe spread over two floors, where five private suites welcome you with exceptional bedding. A discreet guesthouse, nestled in Mediterranean vegetation, awaits to host your guests in an idyllic setting.
content.description3: Let yourself be seduced by our infinity pool that blends into the marine horizon, and discover our rooftop offering a breathtaking panorama of Monaco and the Mediterranean.
content.description4: Between intimacy, elegance, and the art of living, our estate is the perfect setting for an unforgettable getaway on the Riviera.

home.quote: The beauty of a place reveals itself in the caress of light, the silence that inhabits it, and the emotion it evokes.

villa.title: The Villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher
villa.description: A jewel set facing the sea, where every detail invites contemplation. Upon waking, the whisper of waves and the azure view will compose your first memory of the day. The refined volumes, open to the exterior, offer a subtle sensory experience, combining sophistication and Riviera authenticity.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of the spaces: light-bathed suites, a pool suspended above the sea, a rooftop with poetic accents...

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose this villa?
whyChooseUs.description: It's a true rare gem, brand new and ready to enhance your stay. Whether for a relaxing vacation or a luxury getaway, you'll be won over by its high-end amenities and unique location.

hero.title: The sky and sea experience
hero.subtitle: Enjoy the heights of the French Riviera, a haven of peace with breathtaking views of the Mediterranean.

events.title: Places & Events to Discover
events.description: Discover our selection of must-visit places and events during your stay in our exceptional villa.

fortAntoine.title: Night Walk at Fort Antoine
fortAntoine.description: An open-air theater located on the heights of Monaco, Fort Antoine hosts intimate artistic performances under the stars. Enjoy a show in this historic venue, facing the sea, in a unique atmosphere blending culture, heritage and nocturnal magic.

monacoGP.title: Monaco Grand Prix
monacoGP.description: Experience the legendary race from our villa or with our VIP access to the best stands on the circuit.

casino.title: Monte-Carlo Casino
casino.description: Try your luck at the legendary casino where James Bond is a regular. Belle √âpoque architecture and sophisticated atmosphere.

oceanographic.title: Oceanographic Museum
oceanographic.description: More than 6000 marine species, giant aquariums and interactive exhibitions in a majestic building overlooking the sea.

rally.title: Monte-Carlo Historic Rally
rally.description: Admire vintage cars traveling the winding roads of the countryside during this prestigious competition.

customsPath.title: Customs Officers Path
customsPath.description: Preserved coastal walk offering spectacular views of the sea and secret coves of the French Riviera.

ezeVillage.title: √àze Village
ezeVillage.description: Perched at 429m altitude, this medieval village offers a 360¬∞ view of the French Riviera and houses the famous Exotic Garden.

littleAfrica.title: Little Africa in Beaulieu
littleAfrica.description: Secret botanical garden housing rare exotic species and an intimate beach away from the crowds.

corbusier.title: Le Corbusier Path
corbusier.description: Architectural route along the sea revealing iconic villas, including Eileen Gray's famous Villa E-1027.

garnier.title: Monte-Carlo Garnier Opera House
garnier.description: Architectural masterpiece usually closed to the public, but accessible during exclusive guided tours that we can organize.

blueGulf.title: Blue Gulf
blueGulf.description: Secret cove accessible only by a discreet path or by sea, offering crystal clear waters and rare tranquility.

terms.title: General Terms & Conditions
terms.content:
General Terms & Conditions
Villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher
The rental of Villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher, owned by SAS ALPHA GROUP, is governed by these General Terms, which the tenant fully and unconditionally accepts upon signing the rental agreement.

1. Maximum Occupancy
The villa accommodates a maximum of 10 people (including children). Exceeding this number is strictly prohibited and may result in immediate termination of the stay without refund.

2. Parties, Noise & Quiet Hours
Parties, gatherings, or events are strictly forbidden.
No excessive noise is permitted between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM to respect neighbors.
Violations may lead to police intervention and immediate eviction without refund.

3. Pets
Pets are not allowed unless prior written approval is obtained from SAS ALPHA GROUP. Unauthorized pets will result in immediate contract termination at the tenant's expense.

4. Property Use
The tenant agrees to:
Use the villa peacefully and exclusively for vacation purposes.
Respect the house rules, property, equipment, and neighbors.

5. Access & Security
Keys, badges, and access devices are strictly personal and must be returned upon departure.
Lost items will be charged for replacement.
The tenant must secure doors, gates, and alarms when leaving the villa.

6. Cleanliness & Condition
The villa is delivered clean and in perfect condition. The tenant must return it in a similar state. Additional cleaning fees may apply if not respected.

7. Image & Intellectual Property Rights
All photos, videos, and visuals of the villa are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP.
Unauthorized use, reproduction, or exploitation is prohibited and will lead to legal action.

8. Surveillance & Security
For security reasons, certain outdoor areas may be under video surveillance (compliant with local laws). No cameras are installed in private or indoor spaces.

9. Liability & Insurance
The tenant is fully responsible for damages, losses, or deterioration caused to the villa or its contents.
Travel insurance covering rental liability is strongly recommended.

10. Acceptance
Signing the rental agreement constitutes full acceptance of:
These General Terms,
The General Terms of Sale,
And the House Rules.

sales.title: General Terms and Conditions of Sale
sales.content:
General Terms and Conditions of Sale
1. Booking
The reservation of the villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher, owned by SAS ALPHA GROUP, is considered firm and final only after:
Receipt of a 50% deposit of the total stay amount,
And the signing of a rental contract established for each booking.
The rental contract must be drafted and signed by both parties before any access to the property is granted.
The remaining balance must be paid in full no later than 60 days before arrival. Failure to pay by this deadline may result in automatic cancellation without refund of the deposit.

2. Security Deposit
A ‚Ç¨5,000 security deposit is required upon arrival. It will be refunded within 15 days after departure, minus any deductions for damages, breaches of regulations, or additional costs.

3. Cancellation
Any cancellation by the client will result in the following conditions:
More than 90 days before arrival: 70% refund of the deposit,
Between 90 and 60 days: 50% refund of the deposit,
Between 60 and 30 days: No refund of the deposit,
Less than 30 days before arrival: No refund, the full stay amount remains due.
There is no right of withdrawal.

4. Arrival & Departure
Check-in: From 4:00 PM,
Check-out: By 10:00 AM.
Any unauthorized delay will result in additional charges.

5. Capacity & Usage
Maximum occupancy: 10 people (including children).
Strictly prohibited: Parties, events, or receptions.
No excessive noise between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM.
No pets allowed unless prior written approval.
Violations may result in immediate termination of the contract with no refund.

6. House Rules
The guest must comply with the house rules provided upon arrival. Serious violations (damages, disturbances, breach of prohibitions) may lead to loss of the deposit and legal action.

7. Additional Services
Extra services (private chef, butler, concierge, etc.) must be booked at least 15 days before arrival. Modifications/cancellations require 7 days' notice; otherwise, full payment is due.

8. Image & Intellectual Property Rights
All photos, videos, and visuals of the villa are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP. Unauthorized reproduction or use is strictly prohibited.

9. Liability
The guest is responsible for damages caused by themselves or their companions. Travel insurance is mandatory and may be requested upon arrival.

10. Disputes
In case of disputes, parties will seek an amicable solution. Otherwise, jurisdiction falls to the courts where the villa is located.
